Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

28  KSIntCalculatorArgon::KSIntCalculatorArgon()
29  {
30  fSupportingPointsTotalCrossSection = new std::map< double, double >();
31  fParametersTotalCrossSection = new std::vector< double >();
32  fDifferentialCrossSectionInterpolator = new katrin::KMathBilinearInterpolator< double >();
33  }

35  KSIntCalculatorArgon::~KSIntCalculatorArgon()
36  {
37  delete fSupportingPointsTotalCrossSection;
38  delete fParametersTotalCrossSection;
39  delete fDifferentialCrossSectionInterpolator;
40  }
41 
42  double KSIntCalculatorArgon::GetInterpolationForTotalCrossSection( const double &anEnergy, std::map< double, double >::iterator &point ) const
43  {
44  assert( anEnergy == anEnergy );
45  assert( anEnergy >= 0. );
46  std::map< double, double >::iterator firstPoint = point;
47  --firstPoint;
48 
49  double slope = (point->second - firstPoint->second) / (point->first - firstPoint->first);
50  double y0 = firstPoint->second - slope * firstPoint->first;
51 
52  return slope * anEnergy + y0;
53  }
54 
55  double KSIntCalculatorArgon::GetUpperExtrapolationForTotalCrossSection( const double &anEnergy, std::map< double, double >::iterator & ) const
56  {
57  assert( anEnergy == anEnergy );
58  assert( anEnergy >= 0. );
59  return fParametersTotalCrossSection->at( 0 ) * pow( anEnergy, fParametersTotalCrossSection->at( 1 ) );
60  }
61 
62  double KSIntCalculatorArgon::GetLowerExtrapolationForTotalCrossSection( const double &, std::map< double, double >::iterator & ) const
63  {
64  return 0;
65  }
66 
67  double KSIntCalculatorArgon::GetTheta( const double &anEnergy ) const
68  {
69  assert( anEnergy == anEnergy );
70  assert( anEnergy >= 0. );
71  double sigma_max = GetDifferentialCrossSectionAt( anEnergy, 5. );
72  sigma_max *= 1.5;
73  double sigma_min = GetDifferentialCrossSectionAt( anEnergy, 180. );
74  sigma_min *= 0.9;
75  double tTheta_deg;
76 
77  while( true )
78  {
79  tTheta_deg = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., 180., false, true );
80  if( KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( sigma_min, sigma_max, false, true ) < GetDifferentialCrossSectionAt( anEnergy, tTheta_deg )
81 
82  )
83  break;
84  }
85 
86  return tTheta_deg * KConst::Pi() / 180.;
87  }
88 
89  double KSIntCalculatorArgon::GetTotalCrossSectionAt( const double &anEnergy ) const
90  {
91  assert( anEnergy == anEnergy );
92  assert( anEnergy >= 0. );
93  // Zero? Interpolation? Extrapolation? Make a decision and execute it...
94 
95  std::map< double, double >::iterator point = fSupportingPointsTotalCrossSection->lower_bound( anEnergy );
96 
97  if( point == fSupportingPointsTotalCrossSection->begin() )
98  {
99  // Lower extrapolation
100  return GetLowerExtrapolationForTotalCrossSection( anEnergy, point );
101  }
102  else if( point == fSupportingPointsTotalCrossSection->end() )
103  {
104  // Upper extrapolation
105  return GetUpperExtrapolationForTotalCrossSection( anEnergy, point );
106  }
107  else
108  {
109  // Linear interpolation
110  return GetInterpolationForTotalCrossSection( anEnergy, point );
111  }
112  }
113 
114  double KSIntCalculatorArgon::GetDifferentialCrossSectionAt( const double &anEnergy, const double &anAngle ) const
115  {
116  assert( anEnergy == anEnergy );
117  assert( anEnergy >= 0. );
118  assert( anAngle == anAngle );
119  assert( anAngle >= 0. );
120  double maxEnergy = (--fDifferentialCrossSectionInterpolator->GetPoints()->end())->first;
121 
122  if( anEnergy > maxEnergy )
123  {
124  double t = anEnergy / (2. * KConst::ERyd_eV());
125  double c = cos( anAngle * KConst::Pi() / 180. );
126  double k2 = 4. * (t * (1. - c));
127 
128  return 1.85099E-19 * 4.0 * (8.0 + k2) * (8.0 + k2) / pow( 4.0 + k2, 4.0 );
129  }
130  else
131  {
132  return fDifferentialCrossSectionInterpolator->GetValue( anEnergy, anAngle );
133  }
134  }
135 
136  void KSIntCalculatorArgon::InitializeDifferentialCrossSection( unsigned int numOfParameters )
137  {
138  intmsg( eNormal ) << this->GetName() << " Initialize Diff CrossSection" << eom;
139  fDifferentialCrossSectionInterpolator->Reset();
140 
141  // Now read in
142  KTextFile* tInputFile = katrin::CreateDataTextFile( fDataFileDifferentialCrossSection );
143 
144  if( tInputFile->Open( katrin::KFile::eRead ) )
145  {
146  KSIntCalculatorArgonDifferentialCrossSectionReader reader( tInputFile->File(), numOfParameters );
147  if( !reader.Read() )
148  {
149  intmsg( eError ) << "KIntCalculatorArgon::InitializeDifferentialCrossSection " << ret;
150  intmsg( eError ) << " Error while reading < " << tInputFile->GetName() << " > " << eom;
151  }
152  else
153  {
154  // First, copy parameters for extrapolation:
155  //fParametersTotalCrossSection->operator=(*reader.GetParameters());
156 
157  if( reader.GetData()->size() > 0 )
158  {
159  // Copy data to the interpolation
160  std::map< double*, double > *data = reader.GetData();
161 
162  for( std::map< double*, double >::iterator i = data->begin(); i != data->end(); ++i )
163  {
164  fDifferentialCrossSectionInterpolator->AddPoint( i->first[ 0 ], i->first[ 1 ], i->second );
165  }
166  }
167  else
168  {
169  intmsg( eError ) << "KIntCalculatorArgon::InitializeDifferentialCrossSection " << ret;
170  intmsg( eError ) << " No found data in < " << tInputFile->GetName() << " > " << eom;
171  }
172  }
173 
174  tInputFile->Close();
175 
176  }
177  else
178  {
179  intmsg( eError ) << "KIntCalculatorArgon::InitializeTotalCrossSection " << ret;
180  intmsg( eError ) << " Cant open inputfile < " << tInputFile->GetName() << " > " << eom;
181  }
182  }
183 
184  void KSIntCalculatorArgon::InitializeTotalCrossSection( unsigned int numOfParameters )
185  {
186  intmsg( eNormal ) << this->GetName() << " Initialize Total CrossSection" << eom;
187  // Clear supporting points
188  fSupportingPointsTotalCrossSection->clear();
189 
190  // New read in
191  KTextFile* tInputFile = katrin::CreateDataTextFile( fDataFileTotalCrossSection );
192 
193  if( tInputFile->Open( katrin::KFile::eRead ) )
194  {
195  KSIntCalculatorArgonTotalCrossSectionReader reader( tInputFile->File(), numOfParameters );
196  if( !reader.Read() )
197  {
198  intmsg( eError ) << "KIntCalculatorArgon::InitializeTotalCrossSection " << ret;
199  intmsg( eError ) << " Error while reading < " << tInputFile->GetName() << " > " << eom;
200  }
201  else
202  {
203  // First, copy parameters for extrapolation:
204  fParametersTotalCrossSection->operator=( *reader.GetParameters() );
205 
206  if( reader.GetData()->size() > 0 )
207  {
208  // Copy data for interpolation.
209  // It is maybe better to calculate equidistant energy points to find the right
210  // interval earlier...
211  fSupportingPointsTotalCrossSection->operator=( *reader.GetData() );
212  }
213  else
214  {
215  intmsg( eError ) << "KIntCalculatorArgon::InitializeTotalCrossSection " << ret;
216  intmsg( eError ) << " No found data in < " << tInputFile->GetName() << " > " << eom;
217  }
218  }
219 
220  tInputFile->Close();
221  }
222  else
223  {
224  intmsg( eError ) << "KIntCalculatorArgon::InitializeTotalCrossSection " << ret;
225  intmsg( eError ) << " Cant open inputfile < " << tInputFile->GetName() << " > " << eom;
226  }
227  }
228 
229  void KSIntCalculatorArgon::CalculateCrossSection( const KSParticle& aParticle, double& aCrossSection )
230  {
231  CalculateCrossSection( aParticle.GetKineticEnergy_eV(), aCrossSection );
232  return;
233  }

235  void KSIntCalculatorArgon::CalculateCrossSection( const double anEnergy, double& aCrossSection )
236  {
237  assert( anEnergy == anEnergy );
238  assert( anEnergy >= 0. );
239  aCrossSection = this->GetTotalCrossSectionAt( anEnergy );
240  }

245  KSIntCalculatorArgonExcitation::KSIntCalculatorArgonExcitation()
246  {
247  fSupportingPointsTotalCrossSection = new std::map< double, double >();
248  fParametersTotalCrossSection = new std::vector< double >();
249  fDifferentialCrossSectionInterpolator = new katrin::KMathBilinearInterpolator< double >();
250  fExcitationState = 0;
251  fDataFileTotalCrossSection = std::string( "No file selected" );
252 
253  fDataFileDifferentialCrossSection = std::string( "No file selected" );
254  }

263  fParametersTotalCrossSection = new std::vector< double >( *aCopy.fParametersTotalCrossSection );

277 
278  void KSIntCalculatorArgonExcitation::InitializeComponent()
279  {
280  // Use SetExcitationState to change fExcitationState
281  if( fExcitationState > 0 )
282  {
283  // Build file name for excitation state
284  std::stringstream TotalCrossSectionFileName;
285  TotalCrossSectionFileName << "argon_excitation_state-" << this->fExcitationState << "_cross-section.txt";
286 
287  // Set file name
288  fDataFileTotalCrossSection = TotalCrossSectionFileName.str();
289 
290  // Read file and create supporting points
291  InitializeTotalCrossSection( 2 );
292 
293  std::stringstream DiffCrossSectionFileName;
294  DiffCrossSectionFileName << "argon_differential_cross-section_excitation_state." << this->fExcitationState << ".txt";
295 
296  fDataFileDifferentialCrossSection = DiffCrossSectionFileName.str();
297  InitializeDifferentialCrossSection( 0 );
298  }
299  }
300 
301  void KSIntCalculatorArgonExcitation::SetExcitationState( unsigned int aState )
302  {
303  fExcitationState = aState;
304  }
305 
306  void KSIntCalculatorArgonExcitation::ExecuteInteraction( const KSParticle& anInitialParticle, KSParticle& aFinalParticle, KSParticleQueue& )
307  {
308  double tInitialKineticEnergy = anInitialParticle.GetKineticEnergy_eV();
309  KThreeVector tInitialDirection = anInitialParticle.GetMomentum();
310 
311  intmsg_debug( "< " << this->GetName() << " >:ExecuteInteraction() " << ret );
312  intmsg_debug( "tInitialKineticEnergy: " << tInitialKineticEnergy << ret);
313  intmsg_debug( "tInitialDirection X: " << tInitialDirection.X() << " Y: " << tInitialDirection.Y() << " Z: " << tInitialDirection.Z() << ret)
314  assert( tInitialKineticEnergy == tInitialKineticEnergy );
315  assert( tInitialKineticEnergy >= 0. );
316 
317  // outgoing primary
318  double tTheta = GetTheta( tInitialKineticEnergy );
319  intmsg_debug( "tTheta: " << tTheta << ret);
320  assert( tTheta == tTheta );
321  assert( tTheta >= 0. );
322  double tLostKineticEnergy = GetEnergyLoss( tInitialKineticEnergy, tTheta );
323  intmsg_debug( "tLostKineticEnergy: " << tLostKineticEnergy << ret);
324  assert( tLostKineticEnergy == tLostKineticEnergy );
325  assert( tLostKineticEnergy >= 0. );
326  double tPhi = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., 2. * KConst::Pi() );
327  intmsg_debug( "tPhi: " << tPhi << ret << ret);
328 
329  KThreeVector tOrthogonalOne = tInitialDirection.Orthogonal();
330  KThreeVector tOrthogonalTwo = tInitialDirection.Cross( tOrthogonalOne );
331  KThreeVector tFinalDirection = tInitialDirection.Magnitude() * (sin( tTheta ) * (cos( tPhi ) * tOrthogonalOne.Unit() + sin( tPhi ) * tOrthogonalTwo.Unit()) + cos( tTheta ) * tInitialDirection.Unit());
332 
333  aFinalParticle = anInitialParticle;
334  aFinalParticle.SetTime( anInitialParticle.GetTime() );
335  aFinalParticle.SetPosition( anInitialParticle.GetPosition() );
336  aFinalParticle.SetMomentum( tFinalDirection );
337  aFinalParticle.SetKineticEnergy_eV( tInitialKineticEnergy - tLostKineticEnergy );
338 
339  fStepNInteractions = 1;
340  fStepEnergyLoss = tLostKineticEnergy;
341 
342  intmsg_debug( "FinalParticle: " << ret); intmsg_debug( "Time: " << aFinalParticle.GetTime() << ret); intmsg_debug( "Position: " << aFinalParticle.GetPosition().X() << " " << aFinalParticle.GetPosition().Y() << " " << aFinalParticle.GetPosition().Z() << ret ); intmsg_debug( "Momentum: " << aFinalParticle.GetMomentum().X() << " " << aFinalParticle.GetMomentum().Y() << " " << aFinalParticle.GetMomentum().Z() << ret ); intmsg_debug( "KineticEnergy: " << aFinalParticle.GetKineticEnergy_eV() << ret);
343  intmsg_debug( "=============<" << this->GetName() << ">:ExecuteInteraction()" << eom)
344 
345  return;
346  }
347 
348  double KSIntCalculatorArgonExcitation::GetEnergyLoss( const double &, const double & ) const
349  {
350  // The lost kinetic energy is equal to the threshold energy, which currently is the first
351  // element in the data map.
352  return fSupportingPointsTotalCrossSection->begin()->first;
353  }
354 
355  double KSIntCalculatorArgonExcitation::GetDifferentialCrossSectionAt( const double &anEnergy, const double &anAngle ) const
356  {
357  assert( anEnergy == anEnergy );
358  assert( anEnergy >= 0. );
359  assert( anAngle == anAngle );
360  assert( anAngle >= 0. );
361 
362  double maxEnergy = (--fDifferentialCrossSectionInterpolator->GetPoints()->end())->first;
363 
364  if( anEnergy > maxEnergy )
365  {
366  return fDifferentialCrossSectionInterpolator->GetValue( maxEnergy - 1., anAngle ) / this->GetTotalCrossSectionAt( maxEnergy - 1. ) * (this->GetTotalCrossSectionAt( anEnergy ));
367  }
368  else
369  {
370  return fDifferentialCrossSectionInterpolator->GetValue( anEnergy, anAngle );
371  }
372  }
373 
374  void KSIntCalculatorArgonExcitation::InitializeDifferentialCrossSection( unsigned int numOfParameters )
375  {
376  //This Method differs from the Base Class method only in the use of Readlx() instead of Read()
377  //to use the files from the LxCat data base
378  fDifferentialCrossSectionInterpolator->Reset();
379 
380  // Now read in
381  KTextFile* tInputFile = katrin::CreateDataTextFile( fDataFileDifferentialCrossSection );
382 
383  if( tInputFile->Open( katrin::KFile::eRead ) )
384  {
385  KSIntCalculatorArgonDifferentialCrossSectionReader reader( tInputFile->File(), numOfParameters );
386  if( !reader.Readlx() )
387  {
388  intmsg( eError ) << "KIntCalculatorArgon::InitializeDifferentialCrossSection " << ret;
389  intmsg( eError ) << " Error while reading < " << tInputFile->GetName() << " > " << eom;
390  }
391  else
392  {
393  // First, copy parameters for extrapolation:
394  //fParametersTotalCrossSection->operator=(*reader.GetParameters());
395 
396  if( reader.GetData()->size() > 0 )
397  {
398  // Copy data to the interpolation
399  std::map< double*, double > *data = reader.GetData();
400 
401  for( std::map< double*, double >::iterator i = data->begin(); i != data->end(); ++i )
402  {
403  fDifferentialCrossSectionInterpolator->AddPoint( i->first[ 0 ], i->first[ 1 ], i->second );
404  }
405  }
406  else
407  {
408  intmsg( eError ) << "KIntCalculatorArgon::InitializeDifferentialCrossSection " << ret;
409  intmsg( eError ) << " No found data in < " << tInputFile->GetName() << " > " << eom;
410  }
411  }
412 
413  tInputFile->Close();
414  }
415  else
416  {
417  intmsg( eError ) << "KIntCalculatorArgon::InitializeTotalCrossSection " << ret;
418  intmsg( eError ) << " Cant open inputfile < " << tInputFile->GetName() << " > " << ret;
419  intmsg( eError ) << "fDataFileDifferentialCrossSection: " << fDataFileDifferentialCrossSection << eom;
420  }
421  }

453  void KSIntCalculatorArgonElastic::InitializeComponent()
454  {
455  intmsg_debug( "initializing argon elastic calculator" << eom);
456  // numOfParameters: two for extrapolation.
457  InitializeTotalCrossSection( 2 );

460 
461  double KSIntCalculatorArgonElastic::GetDifferentialCrossSectionAt( const double &anEnergy, const double &anAngle ) const
462  {
463  assert( anEnergy == anEnergy );
464  assert( anEnergy >= 0. );
465  assert( anAngle == anAngle );
466  assert( anAngle >= 0. );
467  double maxEnergy = (--fDifferentialCrossSectionInterpolator->GetPoints()->end())->first;
468 
469  if( anEnergy > maxEnergy )
470  {
471  double k2 = 4. * anEnergy / (2. * KConst::ERyd_eV()) * (1. - cos( anAngle * KConst::Pi() / 180. ));
472 
473  return 1.85099E-19 * 4.0 * (8.0 + k2) * (8.0 + k2) / pow( 4.0 + k2, 4.0 );
474  }
475  else
476  {
477  return fDifferentialCrossSectionInterpolator->GetValue( anEnergy, anAngle );
478  }
479  }
480 
481  double KSIntCalculatorArgonElastic::GetEnergyLoss( const double &anEnergy, const double &aTheta ) const
482  {
483  assert( anEnergy == anEnergy );
484  assert( anEnergy >= 0. );
485  assert( aTheta == aTheta );
486  assert( aTheta >= 0. );
487 
488  double anEloss = 0;
489  // ArMolMass = 1/alpha^2 * #nuclei * m_p/m_e
490  double ArMolMass = 1.38e9;
491  double emass = 1. / (KConst::Alpha() * KConst::Alpha());
492  double cosTheta = cos( aTheta );
493 
494  anEloss = 2. * emass / ArMolMass * (1. - cosTheta) * anEnergy;
495 
496  assert( anEloss == anEloss );
497  assert( anEloss >= 0. );
498 
499  return anEloss;
500  }
501 
502  void KSIntCalculatorArgonElastic::ExecuteInteraction( const KSParticle& anInitialParticle, KSParticle& aFinalParticle, KSParticleQueue& )
503  {
504 
505  double tInitialKineticEnergy = anInitialParticle.GetKineticEnergy_eV();
506  KThreeVector tInitialDirection = anInitialParticle.GetMomentum();
507 
508  intmsg_debug( "< " << this->GetName() << " >:ExecuteInteraction() " << ret );
509  intmsg_debug( "tInitialKineticEnergy: " << tInitialKineticEnergy << ret);
510  intmsg_debug( "tInitialDirection X: " << tInitialDirection.X() << " Y: " << tInitialDirection.Y() << " Z: " << tInitialDirection.Z() << ret)
511  assert( tInitialKineticEnergy == tInitialKineticEnergy );
512  assert( tInitialKineticEnergy >= 0. );
513 
514  // outgoing primary
515 
516  double tTheta = GetTheta( tInitialKineticEnergy );
517  intmsg_debug( "tTheta: " << tTheta << ret);
518  double tLostKineticEnergy = GetEnergyLoss( tInitialKineticEnergy, tTheta );
519  intmsg_debug( "tLostKineticEnergy: " << tLostKineticEnergy << ret);
520  double tPhi = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., 2. * KConst::Pi() );
521  intmsg_debug( "tPhi: " << tPhi << ret << ret);
522 
523  KThreeVector tOrthogonalOne = tInitialDirection.Orthogonal();
524  KThreeVector tOrthogonalTwo = tInitialDirection.Cross( tOrthogonalOne );
525  KThreeVector tFinalDirection = tInitialDirection.Magnitude() * (sin( tTheta ) * (cos( tPhi ) * tOrthogonalOne.Unit() + sin( tPhi ) * tOrthogonalTwo.Unit()) + cos( tTheta ) * tInitialDirection.Unit());
526 
527  aFinalParticle = anInitialParticle;
528  aFinalParticle.SetTime( anInitialParticle.GetTime() );
529  aFinalParticle.SetPosition( anInitialParticle.GetPosition() );
530  aFinalParticle.SetMomentum( tFinalDirection );
531  aFinalParticle.SetKineticEnergy_eV( tInitialKineticEnergy - tLostKineticEnergy );
532 
533  intmsg_debug( "FinalParticle: " << ret); intmsg_debug( "Time: " << aFinalParticle.GetTime() << ret); intmsg_debug( "Position: " << aFinalParticle.GetPosition().X() << " " << aFinalParticle.GetPosition().Y() << " " << aFinalParticle.GetPosition().Z() << ret ); intmsg_debug( "Momentum: " << aFinalParticle.GetMomentum().X() << " " << aFinalParticle.GetMomentum().Y() << " " << aFinalParticle.GetMomentum().Z() << ret ); intmsg_debug( "KineticEnergy: " << aFinalParticle.GetKineticEnergy_eV() << ret);
534  intmsg_debug( "=============<" << this->GetName() << ">:ExecuteInteraction()" << eom)
535 
536  fStepNInteractions = 1;
537  fStepEnergyLoss = tLostKineticEnergy;
538 
539  return;
540  }

545  KSIntCalculatorArgonSingleIonisation::KSIntCalculatorArgonSingleIonisation()
546  {
547  fDataFileTotalCrossSection = std::string( "argon_total_single_ionization_cross-section.txt" );
548  // Ionization energy: 15.759610
549  // National Institut of Standards and Technology, Physical Meas. Laboratory,
550  // http://physics.nist.gov/PhysRefData/Handbook/Tables/argontable1.htm, Nov. 22, 2013
551  fIonizationEnergy = 0.; // Is read from file and set in Initialize()
552  DiffCrossCalculator = new KSIntCalculatorHydrogenIonisation();
553  }

578 
579  void KSIntCalculatorArgonSingleIonisation::InitializeComponent()
580  {
581  // numOfParameters: two for extrapolation power law plus one for the ionization energy.
582  InitializeTotalCrossSection( 3 );
583 
584  // Get ionization energy:
585  fIonizationEnergy = fParametersTotalCrossSection->back();
586 
587  // Remove this energy from parameter list:
588  fParametersTotalCrossSection->pop_back();
589  }
590 
591  void KSIntCalculatorArgonSingleIonisation::ExecuteInteraction( const KSParticle& anInitialParticle, KSParticle& aFinalParticle, KSParticleQueue& aSecondaries )
592  {
593  double tInitialKineticEnergy = anInitialParticle.GetKineticEnergy_eV();
594  KThreeVector tInitialDirection = anInitialParticle.GetMomentum();
595 
596  intmsg_debug( "< " << this->GetName() << " >:ExecuteInteraction() " << ret ); intmsg_debug( "tInitialKineticEnergy: " << tInitialKineticEnergy << ret);
597  intmsg_debug( "tInitialDirection X: " << tInitialDirection.X() << " Y: " << tInitialDirection.Y() << " Z: " << tInitialDirection.Z() << ret)
598 
599  // outgoing primary
600  double tTheta = 0.;
601  double tLostKineticEnergy = GetEnergyLoss( tInitialKineticEnergy, tTheta );
602  intmsg_debug( "tLostKineticEnergy: " << tLostKineticEnergy << ret);
603  tTheta = GetTheta( tInitialKineticEnergy, tLostKineticEnergy );
604  intmsg_debug( "tTheta: " << tTheta << ret);
605  double tPhi = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., 2. * KConst::Pi() );
606  intmsg_debug( "tPhi: " << tPhi << ret << ret);
607 
608  KThreeVector tOrthogonalOne = tInitialDirection.Orthogonal();
609  KThreeVector tOrthogonalTwo = tInitialDirection.Cross( tOrthogonalOne );
610  KThreeVector tFinalDirection = tInitialDirection.Magnitude() * (sin( tTheta ) * (cos( tPhi ) * tOrthogonalOne.Unit() + sin( tPhi ) * tOrthogonalTwo.Unit()) + cos( tTheta ) * tInitialDirection.Unit());
611 
612  aFinalParticle = anInitialParticle;
613  aFinalParticle.SetMomentum( tFinalDirection );
614  aFinalParticle.SetKineticEnergy_eV( tInitialKineticEnergy - tLostKineticEnergy );
615 
616  intmsg_debug( "FinalParticle: " << ret); intmsg_debug( "Time: " << aFinalParticle.GetTime() << ret); intmsg_debug( "Position: " << aFinalParticle.GetPosition().X() << " " << aFinalParticle.GetPosition().Y() << " " << aFinalParticle.GetPosition().Z() << ret ); intmsg_debug( "Momentum: " << aFinalParticle.GetMomentum().X() << " " << aFinalParticle.GetMomentum().Y() << " " << aFinalParticle.GetMomentum().Z() << ret ); intmsg_debug( "KineticEnergy: " << aFinalParticle.GetKineticEnergy_eV() << ret);
617 
618  // Outgoing secondary
619  tTheta = acos( KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( -1., 1. ) );
620  tPhi = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., 2. * KConst::Pi() );
621 
622  tOrthogonalOne = tInitialDirection.Orthogonal();
623  tOrthogonalTwo = tInitialDirection.Cross( tOrthogonalOne );
624  tFinalDirection = tInitialDirection.Magnitude() * (sin( tTheta ) * (cos( tPhi ) * tOrthogonalOne.Unit() + sin( tPhi ) * tOrthogonalTwo.Unit()) + cos( tTheta ) * tInitialDirection.Unit());
625 
626  KSParticle* tSecondary = KSParticleFactory::GetInstance().Create( 11 );
627  (*tSecondary) = anInitialParticle;
628  tSecondary->SetMomentum( tFinalDirection );
629  tSecondary->SetKineticEnergy_eV( tLostKineticEnergy - fIonizationEnergy );
630  tSecondary->SetLabel( GetName() );
631 
632  intmsg_debug( "SecondaryParticle: " << ret); intmsg_debug( "Time: " << tSecondary->GetTime() << ret); intmsg_debug( "Position: " << tSecondary->GetPosition().X() << " " << tSecondary->GetPosition().Y() << " " << tSecondary->GetPosition().Z() << ret ); intmsg_debug( "Momentum: " << tSecondary->GetMomentum().X() << " " << tSecondary->GetMomentum().Y() << " " << tSecondary->GetMomentum().Z() << ret ); intmsg_debug( "KineticEnergy: " << tSecondary->GetKineticEnergy_eV() << ret);
633  intmsg_debug( "=============<" << this->GetName() << ">:ExecuteInteraction()" << eom)
634  aSecondaries.push_back( tSecondary );
635 
636  fStepNInteractions = 1;
637  fStepEnergyLoss = tLostKineticEnergy;
638  return;
639  }
640 
641  double KSIntCalculatorArgonSingleIonisation::GetEnergyLoss( const double &anEnergy, const double & ) const
642  {
643  assert( anEnergy == anEnergy );
644  assert( anEnergy > fIonizationEnergy );
645 
646  double tmpSecEnergy;
647  double tmpMaxCross = KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * 13.2 / anEnergy * log( (anEnergy + 120.0 / anEnergy) / 15.76 ) * 10.3 * 10.3 / (pow( 0. - 2. + 100. / (10. + anEnergy), 2 ) + 10.3 * 10.3);
648 
649  while( true )
650  {
651  tmpSecEnergy = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., (anEnergy - fIonizationEnergy) / 2., false, true );
652 
653  double tmpDiffCross = KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * 13.2 / anEnergy * log( (anEnergy + 120.0 / anEnergy) / 15.76 ) * 10.3 * 10.3 / (pow( tmpSecEnergy - 2. + 100. / (10. + anEnergy), 2 ) + 10.3 * 10.3);
654 
655  if( KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., tmpMaxCross, false, true ) < tmpDiffCross )
656  break;
657  }
658  assert( tmpSecEnergy == tmpSecEnergy );
659  assert( tmpSecEnergy >= 0. );
660 
661  return fIonizationEnergy + tmpSecEnergy;
662  }
663 
664  double KSIntCalculatorArgonSingleIonisation::GetTheta( const double &anEnergy, const double &anEloss ) const
665  {
666  assert( anEnergy == anEnergy );
667  assert( anEnergy >= 0. );
668  assert( anEloss == anEloss );
669  assert( anEloss >= 0. );
670  double sigma_max = GetDifferentialCrossSectionAt( anEnergy, 0., anEloss );
671  sigma_max *= 1.5;
672  double sigma_min = GetDifferentialCrossSectionAt( anEnergy, 180., anEloss );
673  sigma_min *= 0.9;
674  double tTheta_deg;
675 
676  while( true )
677  {
678  tTheta_deg = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., 180., false, true );
679 
680  double tsigma = GetDifferentialCrossSectionAt( anEnergy, tTheta_deg, anEloss );
681 
682  if( KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( sigma_min, sigma_max, false, true ) < tsigma )
683  {
684  break;
685  }
686  }
687  assert( tTheta_deg == tTheta_deg );
688  assert( tTheta_deg >= 0. && tTheta_deg <= 180. );
689 
690  return tTheta_deg * KConst::Pi() / 180.;
691  }
692 
693  double KSIntCalculatorArgonSingleIonisation::GetDifferentialCrossSectionAt( const double &anEnergy, const double &anAngle, const double &anEloss ) const
694  {
695  assert( anEnergy == anEnergy );
696  assert( anEnergy >= 0. );
697  assert( anEloss == anEloss );
698  assert( anEloss >= 0. );
699  assert( anAngle == anAngle );
700  assert( anAngle >= 0. );
701 
702  double aCrossection;
703  DiffCrossCalculator->CalculateDoublyDifferentialCrossSection( anEnergy / fIonizationEnergy, (anEnergy - anEloss) / fIonizationEnergy, cos( anAngle * KConst::Pi() / 180. ), aCrossection );
704 
705  double wrongtotalcross;
706  DiffCrossCalculator->CalculateCrossSection( anEnergy, wrongtotalcross );
707 
708  return aCrossection / wrongtotalcross * this->GetTotalCrossSectionAt( anEnergy );
709  }
710 
714  KSIntCalculatorArgonDoubleIonisation::KSIntCalculatorArgonDoubleIonisation()
715  {
716  fIonizationEnergy = new std::vector< double >( 2, 0 );
717  fDataFileTotalCrossSection = std::string( "argon_total_double_ionization_cross-section.txt" );
718  DiffCrossCalculator = new KSIntCalculatorHydrogenIonisation();
719  }
720 
721  KSIntCalculatorArgonDoubleIonisation::KSIntCalculatorArgonDoubleIonisation( const KSIntCalculatorArgonDoubleIonisation& aCopy ):
722  KSComponent()
723  {
724  delete fSupportingPointsTotalCrossSection;
725  delete fParametersTotalCrossSection;
726 
727  fIonizationEnergy = new std::vector< double >( *aCopy.fIonizationEnergy );
728 
729  fSupportingPointsTotalCrossSection = new std::map< double, double >( *aCopy.fSupportingPointsTotalCrossSection );
730 
731  fParametersTotalCrossSection = new std::vector< double >( *aCopy.fParametersTotalCrossSection );
732 
733  fDataFileTotalCrossSection = aCopy.fDataFileTotalCrossSection;
734  }
735 
736  KSIntCalculatorArgonDoubleIonisation* KSIntCalculatorArgonDoubleIonisation::Clone() const
737  {
738  return new KSIntCalculatorArgonDoubleIonisation( *this );
739  }
740 
741  KSIntCalculatorArgonDoubleIonisation::~KSIntCalculatorArgonDoubleIonisation()
742  {
743  delete fIonizationEnergy;
744  }
745 
746  void KSIntCalculatorArgonDoubleIonisation::InitializeComponent()
747  {
748  // numOfParameters: two for extrapolation power law plus two for the ionization energies.
749  InitializeTotalCrossSection( 4 );
750 
751  // Get second ionization energy
752  (*fIonizationEnergy)[ 1 ] = fParametersTotalCrossSection->back();
753 
754  // Remove this one
755  this->fParametersTotalCrossSection->pop_back();
756 
757  // Get first ionization energy
758  (*fIonizationEnergy)[ 0 ] = fParametersTotalCrossSection->back();
759 
760  // Remove this one
761  fParametersTotalCrossSection->pop_back();
762  }
763 
764  void KSIntCalculatorArgonDoubleIonisation::ExecuteInteraction( const KSParticle& anInitialParticle, KSParticle& aFinalParticle, KSParticleQueue& aSecondaries )
765  {
766  double tInitialKineticEnergy = anInitialParticle.GetKineticEnergy_eV();
767  KThreeVector tInitialDirection = anInitialParticle.GetMomentum();
768  assert( tInitialKineticEnergy == tInitialKineticEnergy );
769  assert( tInitialKineticEnergy >= 0. );
770 
771  intmsg_debug( "< " << this->GetName() << " >:ExecuteInteraction() " << ret ); intmsg_debug( "tInitialKineticEnergy: " << tInitialKineticEnergy << ret);
772  intmsg_debug( "tInitialDirection X: " << tInitialDirection.X() << " Y: " << tInitialDirection.Y() << " Z: " << tInitialDirection.Z() << ret)
773 
774  // outgoing primary
775  double tTheta = 0;
776  double tLostKineticEnergy = GetEnergyLoss( tInitialKineticEnergy, tTheta );
777  intmsg_debug( "tLostKineticEnergy: " << tLostKineticEnergy << ret);
778  tTheta = GetTheta( tInitialKineticEnergy, tLostKineticEnergy );
779  intmsg_debug( "tTheta: " << tTheta << ret);
780  double tPhi = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., 2. * KConst::Pi() );
781  intmsg_debug( "tPhi: " << tPhi << ret << ret);
782 
783  KThreeVector tOrthogonalOne = tInitialDirection.Orthogonal();
784  KThreeVector tOrthogonalTwo = tInitialDirection.Cross( tOrthogonalOne );
785  KThreeVector tFinalDirection = tInitialDirection.Magnitude() * (sin( tTheta ) * (cos( tPhi ) * tOrthogonalOne.Unit() + sin( tPhi ) * tOrthogonalTwo.Unit()) + cos( tTheta ) * tInitialDirection.Unit());
786 
787  aFinalParticle = anInitialParticle;
788  aFinalParticle.SetMomentum( tFinalDirection );
789  aFinalParticle.SetKineticEnergy_eV( tInitialKineticEnergy - tLostKineticEnergy );
790 
791  intmsg_debug( "FinalParticle: " << ret); intmsg_debug( "Time: " << aFinalParticle.GetTime() << ret); intmsg_debug( "Position: " << aFinalParticle.GetPosition().X() << " " << aFinalParticle.GetPosition().Y() << " " << aFinalParticle.GetPosition().Z() << ret ); intmsg_debug( "Momentum: " << aFinalParticle.GetMomentum().X() << " " << aFinalParticle.GetMomentum().Y() << " " << aFinalParticle.GetMomentum().Z() << ret ); intmsg_debug( "KineticEnergy: " << aFinalParticle.GetKineticEnergy_eV() << ret);
792 
793  // Outgoing secondaries
794  for( int i = 0; i < 2; ++i )
795  {
796  tTheta = acos( KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( -1., 1. ) );
797  tPhi = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., 2. * KConst::Pi() );
798 
799  tOrthogonalOne = tInitialDirection.Orthogonal();
800  tOrthogonalTwo = tInitialDirection.Cross( tOrthogonalOne );
801  tFinalDirection = tInitialDirection.Magnitude() * (sin( tTheta ) * (cos( tPhi ) * tOrthogonalOne.Unit() + sin( tPhi ) * tOrthogonalTwo.Unit()) + cos( tTheta ) * tInitialDirection.Unit());
802 
803  KSParticle* tSecondary = KSParticleFactory::GetInstance().Create( 11 );
804  (*tSecondary) = anInitialParticle;
805  tSecondary->SetMomentum( tFinalDirection );
806  tSecondary->SetKineticEnergy_eV( tLostKineticEnergy - fIonizationEnergy->at( i ) );
807  tSecondary->SetLabel( GetName() );
808 
809  aSecondaries.push_back( tSecondary );
810 
811  intmsg_debug( "SecondaryParticle: " << ret); intmsg_debug( "Time: " << tSecondary->GetTime() << ret); intmsg_debug( "Position: " << tSecondary->GetPosition().X() << " " << tSecondary->GetPosition().Y() << " " << tSecondary->GetPosition().Z() << ret ); intmsg_debug( "Momentum: " << tSecondary->GetMomentum().X() << " " << tSecondary->GetMomentum().Y() << " " << tSecondary->GetMomentum().Z() << ret ); intmsg_debug( "KineticEnergy: " << tSecondary->GetKineticEnergy_eV() << ret);
812  }
813  intmsg_debug( "=============<" << this->GetName() << ">:ExecuteInteraction()" << eom)
814 
815  fStepNInteractions = 1;
816  fStepEnergyLoss = tLostKineticEnergy;
817 
818  return;
819  }
820 
821 double KSIntCalculatorArgonDoubleIonisation::GetEnergyLoss( const double &anEnergy, const double & ) const
822 {
823  assert( anEnergy == anEnergy );
824  assert( anEnergy >= 0. );
825 
826  double tmpSecEnergy;
827  double tmpMaxCross = KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * 13.2 / anEnergy * log( (anEnergy + 120.0 / anEnergy) / 15.76 ) * 10.3 * 10.3 / (pow( 0. - 2 + 100. / (10. + anEnergy), 2 ) + 10.3 * 10.3);
828 
829  while( true )
830  {
831  tmpSecEnergy = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., (anEnergy - fIonizationEnergy->at( 0 ) - fIonizationEnergy->at( 1 )) / 2., false, true );
832 
833  double tmpDiffCross = KConst::BohrRadiusSquared() * 13.2 / anEnergy * log( (anEnergy + 120.0 / anEnergy) / 15.76 ) * 10.3 * 10.3 / (pow( tmpSecEnergy - 2. + 100. / (10. + anEnergy), 2 ) + 10.3 * 10.3);
834 
835  if( KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., tmpMaxCross, false, true ) < tmpDiffCross )
836  break;
837  }
838  assert( tmpSecEnergy == tmpSecEnergy );
839  assert( tmpSecEnergy >= 0. );
840 
841  return fIonizationEnergy->at( 0 ) + fIonizationEnergy->at( 1 ) + tmpSecEnergy;
842 }
843 
844 double KSIntCalculatorArgonDoubleIonisation::GetTheta( const double &anEnergy, const double &anEloss ) const
845 {
846  assert( anEnergy == anEnergy );
847  assert( anEnergy >= 0. );
848  assert( anEloss == anEloss );
849  assert( anEloss >= 0. );
850 
851  double sigma_max = GetDifferentialCrossSectionAt( anEnergy, 0., anEloss );
852  sigma_max *= 1.5;
853 
854  double sigma_min = GetDifferentialCrossSectionAt( anEnergy, 180., anEloss );
855  sigma_min *= 0.9;
856 
857  double tTheta_deg;
858 
859  while( true )
860  {
861  tTheta_deg = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., 180., false, true );
862 
863  if( KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( sigma_min, sigma_max, false, true ) < GetDifferentialCrossSectionAt( anEnergy, tTheta_deg, anEloss ) )
864  break;
865  }
866  assert( tTheta_deg == tTheta_deg );
867  assert( tTheta_deg >= 0. && tTheta_deg <= 180. );
868 
869  return tTheta_deg * KConst::Pi() / 180.;
870 }
871 
872 double KSIntCalculatorArgonDoubleIonisation::GetDifferentialCrossSectionAt( const double &anEnergy, const double &anAngle, const double &anEloss ) const
873 {
874  assert( anEnergy == anEnergy );
875  assert( anEnergy >= 0. );
876  assert( anEloss == anEloss );
877  assert( anEloss >= 0. );
878  assert( anAngle == anAngle );
879  assert( anAngle >= 0. );
880 
881  double aCrossection;
882  double wrongtotalcross;
883  double aReducedInitialEnergy = anEnergy / (fIonizationEnergy->at( 1 ));
884  double aReducedFinalEnergy = (anEnergy - anEloss) / fIonizationEnergy->at( 1 );
885 
886  DiffCrossCalculator->CalculateDoublyDifferentialCrossSection( aReducedInitialEnergy, aReducedFinalEnergy, cos( anAngle * KConst::Pi() / 180. ), aCrossection );
887 
888  DiffCrossCalculator->CalculateCrossSection( anEnergy, wrongtotalcross );
889 
890  return aCrossection / wrongtotalcross * this->GetTotalCrossSectionAt( anEnergy );
891 }
892 
896 
897 KSIntCalculatorArgonTotalCrossSectionReader::KSIntCalculatorArgonTotalCrossSectionReader( std::istream *aStream, unsigned int numOfParameters )
898 {
899  fStream = aStream;
900  fNumOfParameters = numOfParameters;
901  fData = new std::map< double, double >();
902  fParameters = new std::vector< double >();
903 }
904 
905 KSIntCalculatorArgonTotalCrossSectionReader::~KSIntCalculatorArgonTotalCrossSectionReader()
906 {
907  delete fData;
908  delete fParameters;
909 }
910 
911 std::vector< double >* KSIntCalculatorArgonTotalCrossSectionReader::GetParameters()
912 {
913  return fParameters;
914 }
915 
916 std::map< double, double >* KSIntCalculatorArgonTotalCrossSectionReader::GetData()
917 {
918  return fData;
919 }
920 
921 bool KSIntCalculatorArgonTotalCrossSectionReader::Read()
922 {
923  intmsg_debug( "reading total cross data" << eom);
924  if( !fStream->good() )
925  {
926  return false;
927  }
928 
929  enum Mode
930  {
931  READ_PARAMETER, READ_DATA
932  };
933 
934  Mode mode = fNumOfParameters > 0 ? READ_PARAMETER : READ_DATA;
935 
936  fData->clear();
937 
938  int pos;
939  double value, secondValue;
940  bool secondValueReaded = false;
941  char c;
942  while( (*fStream) >> c )
943  {
944  // Skip comments
945  if( '#' == c )
946  {
947  fStream->ignore( std::numeric_limits< std::streamsize >::max(), '\n' );
948  }
949  else
950  {
951  pos = fStream->tellg();
952  fStream->seekg( pos - 1 );
953 
954  // Read number
955  (*fStream) >> value;
956 
957  switch( mode )
958  {
959  // The first fNumOfParameters numbers in file are parameters
960  // for extrapolation or something. After that it will read data
961  // points for interpolation.
962  case READ_PARAMETER :
963  fParameters->push_back( value );
964 
965  if( fParameters->size() >= fNumOfParameters )
966  {
967  mode = READ_DATA;
968  }
969  break;
970 
971  // Read data
972  case READ_DATA :
973  if( !secondValueReaded )
974  {
975  secondValue = value;
976  secondValueReaded = true;
977  }
978  else
979  {
980  // Now we have two values. "value" stands for the cross section
981  // and "secondValue" for the energy. Now we could store this data
982  // point into a map:
983  fData->insert( std::pair< double, double >( secondValue, value ) );
984  secondValueReaded = false;
985  }
986  break;
987  }
988  }
989  }
990 
991  if( secondValueReaded )
992  {
993  return false;
994  }
995 
996  intmsg_debug( "...success" << eom);
997  return true;
998 }
999 
1000 KSIntCalculatorArgonDifferentialCrossSectionReader::KSIntCalculatorArgonDifferentialCrossSectionReader( std::istream *aStream, unsigned int numOfParameters )
1001 {
1002  fStream = aStream;
1003  fNumOfParameters = numOfParameters;
1004  fData = new std::map< double*, double >();
1005  fParameters = new std::vector< double >();
1006 }
1007 
1008 KSIntCalculatorArgonDifferentialCrossSectionReader::~KSIntCalculatorArgonDifferentialCrossSectionReader()
1009 {
1010  delete fData;
1011  delete fParameters;
1012 }
1013 
1014 std::vector< double >* KSIntCalculatorArgonDifferentialCrossSectionReader::GetParameters()
1015 {
1016  return fParameters;
1017 }
1018 
1019 std::map< double*, double >* KSIntCalculatorArgonDifferentialCrossSectionReader::GetData()
1020 {
1021  return fData;
1022 }
1023 
1024 bool KSIntCalculatorArgonDifferentialCrossSectionReader::Read()
1025 {
1026  intmsg_debug( "reading diff cross data" << eom);
1027  if( !fStream->good() )
1028  {
1029  return false;
1030  }
1031 
1032  enum Mode
1033  {
1034  READ_PARAMETER, READ_DATA
1035  };
1036 
1037  Mode mode = fNumOfParameters > 0 ? READ_PARAMETER : READ_DATA;
1038 
1039  fData->clear();
1040 
1041  int pos;
1042  double value;
1043  char c;
1044  unsigned int dimX = 0, dimY = 0;
1045  unsigned int currX = 0, currY = 0;
1046 
1047  double *point;
1048 
1049  std::vector< double > energies;
1050  std::vector< double > angles;
1051 
1052  while( (*fStream) >> c )
1053  {
1054  // Skip comments
1055  if( '#' == c )
1056  {
1057  fStream->ignore( std::numeric_limits< std::streamsize >::max(), '\n' );
1058  }
1059  else
1060  {
1061  pos = fStream->tellg();
1062  fStream->seekg( pos - 1 );
1063 
1064  // Read number
1065  (*fStream) >> value;
1066 
1067  switch( mode )
1068  {
1069  // The first fNumOfParameters numbers in file are parameters
1070  // for extrapolation or something. After that it will read data
1071  // points for interpolation.
1072  case READ_PARAMETER :
1073  fParameters->push_back( value );
1074 
1075  if( fParameters->size() >= fNumOfParameters )
1076  {
1077  mode = READ_DATA;
1078  }
1079  break;
1080 
1081  // Read data: The first two numbers gives the dimension of the matrix.
1082  // #1(dimX) x #2(dimY)
1083  case READ_DATA :
1084  if( 0 == dimX )
1085  {
1086  dimX = static_cast< unsigned int >( value );
1087  }
1088  else if( 0 == dimY )
1089  {
1090  dimY = static_cast< unsigned int >( value );
1091  }
1092  else if( energies.size() != dimX - 1 )
1093  {
1094  // The first line (except the first element) gives you the energies...
1095  if( currX > 0 )
1096  {
1097  energies.push_back( value );
1098  }
1099 
1100  if( ++currX >= dimX )
1101  {
1102  currX = 0;
1103  ++currY;
1104  }
1105  }
1106  else
1107  {
1108  if( 0 == currX )
1109  {
1110  // First, store the angle...
1111  angles.push_back( value );
1112  }
1113  else if( value > 0 )
1114  {
1115  // ...and second the cross section:
1116  point = new double[ 2 ];
1117  point[ 0 ] = energies[ currX - 1 ];
1118  point[ 1 ] = angles[ currY - 1 ];
1119 
1120  fData->insert( std::pair< double*, double >( point, value ) );
1121  }
1122 
1123  if( ++currX >= dimX )
1124  {
1125  currX = 0;
1126  ++currY;
1127  }
1128  }
1129  break;
1130  }
1131  }
1132  }
1133 
1134  if( currY != dimY )
1135  {
1136  return false;
1137  }
1138 
1139  intmsg_debug( "...success" << eom);
1140  return true;
1141 }
1142 
1143 bool KSIntCalculatorArgonDifferentialCrossSectionReader::Readlx()
1144 {
1145  intmsg_debug( "reading diff cross data" << eom);
1146  if( !fStream->good() )
1147  {
1148  return false;
1149  }
1150 
1151  enum Mode
1152  {
1153  READ_PARAMETER, READ_DATA
1154  };
1155 
1156  Mode mode = fNumOfParameters > 0 ? READ_PARAMETER : READ_DATA;
1157 
1158  fData->clear();
1159 
1160  double angle;
1161  double parameter;
1162  double energy;
1163  double diffcross;
1164  char c;
1165 
1166  double *point;
1167 
1168  while( (*fStream) >> c )
1169  {
1170  // Skip comments
1171  if( '#' == c )
1172  {
1173  fStream->ignore( std::numeric_limits< std::streamsize >::max(), '\n' );
1174  }
1175  else
1176  {
1177  //rewind input stream to previous position since c is not #
1178  int pos = fStream->tellg();
1179  fStream->seekg( pos - 1 );
1180 
1181  switch( mode )
1182  {
1183  // The first fNumOfParameters numbers in file are parameters
1184  // for extrapolation or something. After that it will read data
1185  // points for interpolation.
1186  case READ_PARAMETER :
1187  // Read number
1188  (*fStream) >> parameter;
1189  fParameters->push_back( parameter );
1190 
1191  if( fParameters->size() >= fNumOfParameters )
1192  {
1193  mode = READ_DATA;
1194  }
1195  break;
1196 
1197  // Within the LXCat Database the differential cross sections
1198  // are delivered as
1199  // Angle (deg) | Energy (eV) | Differential cross section (m2)
1200  case READ_DATA :
1201 
1202  (*fStream) >> angle;
1203  (*fStream) >> energy;
1204  (*fStream) >> diffcross;
1205  point = new double[ 2 ];
1206  point[ 0 ] = energy;
1207  point[ 1 ] = angle;
1208  fData->insert( std::pair< double*, double >( point, diffcross ) );
1209 
1210  break;
1211  }
1212  }
1213  }
1214  intmsg_debug( "...success" << eom);
1215  return true;
1216 }
1217 
1218 } /* namespace Kassiopeia */
